title: Mutyala Haaram with Antique Kundan Pendant - Divine Elegance
materials: and Large Oval Ruby Cabochon Pendant. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Delicate Mutyala Haaram crafted with alternating lustrous freshwater pearls and vibrant ruby beads. The antique-finish Kundan pendant showcases intricate craftsmanship, featuring floral motifs and strategically placed Kundan stones to maximize brilliance. A captivating large oval Ruby cabochon dangles gracefully, adding a touch of regal charm. The Kundan setting is meticulously handcrafted in the traditional Hyderabad style.
colors: Clear (Kundan stones). Classic and auspicious color combination.
occasions: Perfect for traditional occasions like weddings (vivaham)
and festive celebrations (pandugalu). Also suitable for modern events and adding a touch of elegance to contemporary attire.
description: This Mutyala Haaram represents timeless elegance and cultural heritage. The combination of lustrous pearls, vibrant rubies, and exquisite Kundan work makes it a truly unique and valuable piece. The handcrafted design and Hyderabadi polish ensure lasting beauty and durability. It's not just jewelry; it's an heirloom.
